name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: This course is an introduction to the fundamentals of creative writing, covering topics such as plot structure, character development, and narrative voice. Students will learn to read and analyze works of literature, and will complete several writing assignments.

name: Travel Writing
description: This course will focus on the art of travel writing, exploring the techniques and challenges of writing about distant cultures, unfamiliar places, and changing identities. Students will read and write travel essays, short stories, and books.

name: Advanced Travel Writing
description: This course is an advanced exploration of the craft of travel writing. Students will write about their own travel experiences and read and discuss the work of contemporary travel writers. Prerequisites: Travel Writing.
